summary: An email from August 26, 2019, requesting FBI agent assistance for a hearing in the Epstein case scheduled for the following morning. The email notes that at least 20 victims are expected to attend, and the SDNY has asked for help with victim support and press management.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the case for which the hearing is being held.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing
events.description: A hearing regarding the Epstein case was scheduled for 10:30 AM. The SDNY requested FBI agent assistance for victim support and press management, with at least 20 victims anticipated to attend.

keyFacts: A hearing in the Epstein case was scheduled for August 27, 2019, at 10:30 AM.
At least 20 victims were expected to attend the hearing, with upwards of 30 anticipated.
The SDNY requested FBI agent assistance for victim support and to help avoid the press.
The email is a logistical request for FBI personnel to assist with the hearing.
